content.raw:
Interesting. Do you know your display's resolution? It would be great if you could post a screen shot too, so we know how it looks like on your screen.

On [GzWeb](http://gazebosim.org/gzweb), the arrows **look** thicker for mobile than for desktop:

![desktop_translate-3390559f43677d2c53d2adf2dbe2d902.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/771596095-desktop_translate-3390559f43677d2c53d2adf2dbe2d902.png)

![mobile_translate-5e74a9472a798f128224c1903d025208.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3875265829-mobile_translate-5e74a9472a798f128224c1903d025208.png)

But actually both versions have hidden [hotspots](https://myshumi.net/2014/03/11/gzweb-mobile/) so they can be activated by a larger area around them:

![hotspot.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3737688809-hotspot.png)
